metadata.title: CVE-2019-11187 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Incorrect Access Control in the LDAP class of GONICUS GOsa through2019-04-11 allows an attacker to log into any account with a usernamecontaining the case-insensitive substring "success" when an arbitrarypassword is provided.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11187` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gosa - 2.7.4+reloaded2-9ubuntu1.1
gosa-desktop - 2.7.4+reloaded2-9ubuntu1.1
gosa-help-de - 2.7.4+reloaded2-9ubuntu1.1

criterions.comment: fusiondirectory package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
gosa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.4+reloaded2-9ubuntu1.1').
